## Welcome!

My name is Tanner Houston. I am a 2nd year Doctoral Student in the Health Policy (Management) program at Harvard Business School.

My research focuses on competitive strategy specific to the healthcare setting, care delivery innovation, and the effects of vertical consolidation.

Check out the **About Me** section to learn more of my interest outside of academia!
